pr_title: DROOLS-5659 DMN code maint.: dead code elimination from -legacy-tests

timeline.message: DROOLS-5659 DMN code maint.: dead code elimination from -legacy-tests

timeline.bodyText:
This code was changed a couple of weeks ago + another piece of code at [1]. Could you please take a look at it? Thank you!
[1] 
  
    
      drools/kie-dmn/kie-dmn-core/src/test/java/org/kie/dmn/core/DMNCompilerTest.java

      in
      2356544
    
    
    
    

        
          
           FEELPropertyAccessible outputSet = ((DMNContextFPAImpl)evaluateAll.getContext()).getFpa();
timeline.author: hellowdan

replies.bodyText:
it is expected, please notice

this is kie-dmn-legacy-tests so these tests here are not forced to be running with typesafe activated and
this PR removed a dead code (but is dead code ONLY for legacy)
replies.author: tarilabs
